sentences.en: A fence runs around our classroom.
sentences.cn: 我们的教室周围有一圈篱笆。

sentences.en: The boy bounced out of the classroom.
sentences.cn: 那男孩突然从教室里奔出去。

sentences.en: The students swarmed out of the classroom.
sentences.cn: 学生们蜂拥着跑出了教室。

sentences.en: They climbed out through the window.
sentences.cn: 他们从窗户爬出来。

sentences.en: Boost me up so I can look in the window.
sentences.cn: 把我向上抬起，这样我能朝窗户里面看。

sentences.en: They deducted the cost of the broken window from his allowance.
sentences.cn: 他们从他的津贴中扣除损坏窗户的费用。

phrases.cn: 贴在窗口上；摆在橱窗里

sentences.en: She marked a square on the blackboard.
sentences.cn: 她在黑板上画了个正方形。

sentences.en: She rubbed the exercises off the blackboard after class.
sentences.cn: 下课后她把习题从黑板上擦掉。

sentences.en: They realigned the desks so that they face the blackboard.
sentences.cn: 他们将书桌重新排好使其面向黑板。

sentences.en: We waited for the lights to change.
sentences.cn: 我们等着红绿灯转换。

sentences.en: Eventually the lights turned green.
sentences.cn: 绿灯终于亮了。

sentences.en: The driver had failed to stop at a red light.
sentences.cn: 红灯亮时司机没有把车停下。

sentences.en: The room had several pictures on the walls.
sentences.cn: 那个房间墙上有几幅画。

sentences.en: a book with pictures in it
sentences.cn: 带插图的书

sentences.en: He asked her permission to paint her picture (= paint a picture of her ) .
sentences.cn: 他请求她允许为她画像。

phrases.cn: 是…的化身；与…非常相像；十足…的样子

sentences.en: Could you open the door for me?
sentences.cn: 请你帮我开门好吗？

sentences.en: The door flew open and Ruth stormed in.
sentences.cn: 门一下子打开了，露丝气冲冲地跑了进来。

sentences.en: Don’t forget to lock the garage door.
sentences.cn: 别忘了把车库的门锁上。

sentences.en: She stayed after class and went up to the teacher's desk. Jean thanked Mrs. Slaton and told her about her dream of becoming a pilot.
sentences.cn: 下课之后，她走到讲台前，感谢斯莱顿夫人，并且告诉斯莱顿夫人她的梦想是成为一名飞行员。

sentences.en: One morning before class, when I was running into the classroom, I knocked over the ink bottle on the teacher's desk, and the red ink spilt on the desk.
sentences.cn: 一天早上，上课之前，当我冲进教室的时候，我撞翻了讲桌上的墨水瓶，红墨水洒满了桌子。

sentences.en: a huge global computer network
sentences.cn: 巨大的全球计算机网络

sentences.en: the latest computer software
sentences.cn: 最新的计算机软件

sentences.en: a ceiling fan
sentences.cn: 吊扇

sentences.en: the Great Wall of China
sentences.cn: 中国的长城

sentences.en: We climbed over the wall into the orchard.
sentences.cn: 我们翻墙进了果园。

phrases.cn: 万里长城；中国长城计算机集团公司

sentences.en: a polished wooden floor
sentences.cn: 上过蜡的木地板

sentences.en: a puddle of water on the kitchen floor
sentences.cn: 厨房地面上的一摊水

sentences.en: a warehouse that has 410,000 square feet of floor space
sentences.cn: 楼面面积为41万平方英尺的仓库

sentences.en: Why don’t you tell us what really happened?
sentences.cn: 你为什么不把真相告诉我们？

sentences.en: Oliver’s not really her brother.
sentences.cn: 奥利弗其实不是她弟弟。

sentences.en: I never know what he’s really thinking.
sentences.cn: 我从来都不知道他的真实想法。

sentences.en: They live near London.
sentences.cn: 他们住在伦敦附近。

sentences.en: I’m sure they live somewhere near here.
sentences.cn: 我肯定他们就住在这附近。

sentences.en: They moved house to be nearer the school.
sentences.cn: 他们把家搬到离学校近一些。

phrases.cn: 走进；险些；可与…相比（多用于否定句）

sentences.en: a new TV set
sentences.cn: 一台新电视机

sentences.en: He’s the top TV presenter for children’s programmes.
sentences.cn: 他是最优秀的儿童电视节目主持人。

sentences.en: Mary cooked and cleaned for them.
sentences.cn: 玛丽为他们做饭、打扫卫生。

sentences.en: If there’s anything I can do to help, just give me a call.
sentences.cn: 如果需要我帮忙，就给我打个电话。

sentences.en: The pupil tossed his schoolbag into the air.
sentences.cn: 小学生把书包扔向空中。

sentences.en: Steve took my schoolbag and put it in a tree.
sentences.cn: 斯蒂文拿走我的书包放在了一棵树上。

sentences.en: Mom, could you buy me a new green leather schoolbag?
sentences.cn: 妈妈，你能为我买一个新的绿色皮书包吗？

sentences.en: He has lost his maths book.
sentences.cn: 他（已经）把数学书丢了。

sentences.en: An English book , a maths book , three storybooks and …
sentences.cn: 一本英语书，一本数学书，三本故事书和……

sentences.en: The teacher told the students to read deeply in the maths book.
sentences.cn: 老师让学生们深入学习那本数学书。

sentences.en: This is an English book.
sentences.cn: 这是一本英语书。

sentences.en: We plan to edit an English book for use in foreign language colleges.
sentences.cn: 我们计划编辑一本英语书给外语大学使用。

sentences.en: She has an English class this morning,so she brings her English book.
sentences.cn: 她今天早上有英语课，所以带上了英语书。

sentences.en: Chinese book and an English book.
sentences.cn: 一本语文书和一本英语书。

sentences.en: colourful storybooks
sentences.cn: 彩色故事书

sentences.en: a box of candies
sentences.cn: 一盒糖果

sentences.en: a chocolate candy bar
sentences.cn: 巧克力条

sentences.en: Do you want a piece of candy?
sentences.cn: 你要吃颗糖吗？

phrases.cn: n. 单独包装的块状糖

sentences.en: Copy this page in your notebook.
sentences.cn: 把这一页抄到你的笔记本上。

sentences.en: She rummaged in the desk drawers for her notebook.
sentences.cn: 她在书桌抽屉里翻找她的笔记本。

sentences.en: She immediately copied the letter in her notebook.
sentences.cn: 她立即把这封信抄在她的笔记本里。

phrases.cn: 笔记本电脑；笔记本型个人计算机

sentences.en: some toys for the baby
sentences.cn: 宝宝玩的一些玩具

sentences.en: Annie was playing happily with her toys .
sentences.cn: 安妮正高兴地玩着玩具。

sentences.en: They put the key in the door and entered.
sentences.cn: 他们用钥匙开了门然后走了进去。

sentences.en: Wow! Look at that!
sentences.cn: 哇！看呀！

sentences.en: two boys searching for a lost ball
sentences.cn: 在寻找一个丢失的球的两个男孩

sentences.en: I love your book so much.
sentences.cn: 我非常喜欢你的书。

sentences.en: a cute little puppy
sentences.cn: 一只逗人爱的小狗

sentences.en: The baby’s so cute.
sentences.cn: 这婴儿真可爱。

sentences.en: That’s a really cute outfit.
sentences.cn: 那套衣服真漂亮。

sentences.en: He was a big strong man.
sentences.cn: 他高大健壮。

sentences.en: Jack was tall and strong.
sentences.cn: 杰克又高又壮。

sentences.en: I’m not strong enough to fight him.
sentences.cn: 和他打我还不够强壮。

phrases.cn: 对…特别偏爱的，特别注重…的
支撑点，坚固支撑点；强项；据点

sentences.en: a friendly smile
sentences.cn: 亲切的微笑

sentences.en: I’ve found a great pub – good beer and a friendly atmosphere.
sentences.cn: 我找到了一家很棒的酒馆——啤酒好，氛围也亲切。

phrases.cn: 保护生态环境的；对生态环境无害的

sentences.en: We’ll have to be quiet so as not to wake the baby.
sentences.cn: 我们得安静点，免得吵醒宝宝。

sentences.en: It’s a nice car. The engine’s really quiet.
sentences.cn: 这车真好，发动机声音很小。

sentences.en: I’ll be as quiet as a mouse (= very quiet ).
sentences.cn: 我会像老鼠一样悄无声息的。

sentences.en: Her hair was short and dark.
sentences.cn: 她的头发又短又黑。

sentences.en: a short fat man with no hair on his head
sentences.cn: 光头的矮胖男人

sentences.en: I sat down and took off my shoes and socks.
sentences.cn: 我坐下来脱掉鞋子和袜子。

sentences.en: What size shoes do you take?
sentences.cn: 你穿几号的鞋子？

phrases.cn: n. 关键所在；困难所在

sentences.en: ...the 140 million Americans who wear glasses or contact lenses.
sentences.cn: …1.4亿戴眼镜或者隐性眼镜的美国人。

sentences.en: Leo took off his coat and sat down.
sentences.cn: 利奥脱掉大衣坐了下来。

sentences.en: I love his sense of humour, don’t you?
sentences.cn: 我喜欢他的幽默感，你呢？

sentences.en: Even his own mother would not have recognized him.
sentences.cn: 即使他的亲生母亲也会认不出他的。

sentences.en: Shall we go out to the cinema or stay at home?
sentences.cn: 我们是出去看电影还是待在家里？

sentences.en: You can have ham, cheese, or tuna.
sentences.cn: 你可以选择火腿、干酪或者金枪鱼。

sentences.en: She wasn’t involved in drugs or anything like that.
sentences.cn: 她没有涉毒之类的行为。

sentences.en: I think you’ve made the right decision.
sentences.cn: 我认为你作出了正确的决定。

sentences.en: I think she’s definitely the right person for the job.
sentences.cn: 我认为她绝对是这份工作的合适人选。

sentences.en: Maria was wearing a beautiful new hat.
sentences.cn: 玛丽亚戴着一顶漂亮的新帽子。

phrases.cn: 毕恭毕敬地；温顺地；恳求地

sentences.en: She looked at her watch.
sentences.cn: 她看了一下表。

sentences.en: Her room was pleasant and airy.
sentences.cn: 她的房间既舒适又通风。

sentences.en: She makes her own clothes.
sentences.cn: 她自己做衣服。

sentences.en: a hotel with 50 bedrooms
sentences.cn: 有50间客房的旅馆

phrases.cn: 学科；学习的进程；研究课程
进一步研究；深造；继续教育，进修

sentences.en: Sam went into the kitchen to make a pot of tea.
sentences.cn: 萨姆走进厨房去沏一壶茶。

sentences.en: She is in the kitchen making a meal.
sentences.cn: 她在厨房里做饭。

phrases.cn: n. 政府首脑的参谋团；厨房的餐具柜

sentences.en: The water shed from the bathroom.
sentences.cn: 水是从浴室中溢出来的。

sentences.en: We revamped our bathroom last month.
sentences.cn: 我们在上个月装修了浴室。

sentences.en: My glasses steamed when I came into the bathroom.
sentences.cn: 我走进浴室时，眼镜上蒙上了一层水气。

sentences.en: You should go to bed early.
sentences.cn: 你应该早点上床。

sentences.en: She got into bed and turned out the light.
sentences.cn: 她上了床，关掉灯。

sentences.en: Much of his work is done by phone .
sentences.cn: 他的工作大部分是通过电话进行的。

sentences.en: Who was that on the phone ?
sentences.cn: 谁来的电话？

sentences.en: I wish Amy would get off the phone .
sentences.cn: 我真希望埃米别再打电话了。

sentences.en: The food was served on long tables.
sentences.cn: 食物放在长餐桌上供应。

sentences.en: He sprang up from the sofa.
sentences.cn: 他从沙发上猛然跳了起来。

sentences.en: She spread a sheet on the sofa for me.
sentences.cn: 她为我在沙发上铺了一条单子。

sentences.en: She stood up from the sofa, and then reached me the book.
sentences.cn: 她从沙发上站起身来，把那本书递给了我。

phrases.cn: 沙发床，坐卧两用的长沙发

sentences.en: It can be anything: spoiled milk from the back of your fridge right down to tar and feathers.
sentences.cn: 它可以是任何玩意儿：从你冰箱后面那些变质的牛奶到沥青和羽毛。

sentences.en: If you like fish but hate the smell, soak your fish in water and baking soda for an hour in the  fridge.
sentences.cn: 如果你爱吃鱼但又不喜欢那惺味的话，不妨将鱼浸泡在小苏打水里然后在冰箱里放上一小时。

sentences.en: Because of this, he says, children learning English "need someone to show them the letters, teach them the letter sounds, play with letter magnets on the fridge.
sentences.cn: 因此，他说，儿童学习英语“需要有人给他们看这些字母，教他们字母的读音，与他们玩贴在冰箱上的磁铁字母。”

sentences.en: I can’t find the car keys.
sentences.cn: 我找不到汽车钥匙。

sentences.en: Hold on while I find a pen.
sentences.cn: 别挂电话，我找支笔。

sentences.en: Her body was later found hidden in the bushes.
sentences.cn: 后来有人发现她的尸体被藏在了灌木丛里。

phrases.cn: 自我感觉；发现自己处于某种状态；发现自己的能力
v. 找出，查明；发现，揭发

sentences.en: Has anyone seen my keys? I can’t find them anywhere.
sentences.cn: 有人见到我的钥匙吗？我哪儿都找不到。

sentences.en: The police were very helpful when I spoke to them.
sentences.cn: 我和警察说了，他们很帮忙。

sentences.en: I lent him several books, but he hasn’t read any of them.
sentences.cn: 我借给他几本书，但他一本还没看过。

sentences.en: roast beef
sentences.cn: 烤牛肉

sentences.en: We have both dairy and beef cattle on the farm.
sentences.cn: 我们农场里奶牛和菜牛都有。

phrases.cn: vt. 加强（增援，充实）；补充（人数， 兵力）等

sentences.en: Yes, it tastes like chicken.
sentences.cn: 是的，它的味道像鸡。

sentences.en: We need some meat,chicken and fish.
sentences.cn: 我们需要一些肉，鸡肉和鱼。

sentences.en: Our bodies need some meat, chicken and fish.
sentences.cn: 我们的身体需要一些肉，鸡肉和鱼。

sentences.en: Do you like rice or noodles?
sentences.cn: 你喜欢米饭还是面条？

sentences.en: They like to eat hamburgers, pizza and sandwiches but we always eat rice, congee, and noodles.
sentences.cn: 他们喜欢吃汉堡包，比萨饼和三明治，但是我们总是吃米饭，稀粥和面条。

sentences.en: Have you ever eaten noodles before?
sentences.cn: 你以前吃过面条吗？

sentences.en: homemade tomato soup
sentences.cn: 自制的番茄汤

sentences.en: fresh fruit and vegetables
sentences.cn: 新鲜果蔬

sentences.en: organic methods of growing vegetables
sentences.cn: 蔬菜的有机种植方法

sentences.en: vegetable soup
sentences.cn: 蔬菜汤

sentences.en: We still lack a pair of chopsticks.
sentences.cn: 还少一双筷子。

sentences.en: Before lunch he learned the foreigner how to use chopsticks.
sentences.cn: 午饭前他教那个外国人怎样使筷子。

sentences.en: If you want your friend to try something they should pick it up from your plate with their own chopsticks.
sentences.cn: 如果你想让你的朋友尝尝某道菜时，应该让他们用他们自己的筷子从你的盘中夹。

sentences.en: Mix all the ingredients thoroughly in a large bowl.
sentences.cn: 将所有配料放在大碗里搅拌均匀。

sentences.en: Fill the bowl with water.
sentences.cn: 在碗里装满水。

phrases.cn: 美国橄榄球超级杯大赛
搅拌钵；混料罐；[美俚]公路交叉点

sentences.en: Put the knives and forks on the table.
sentences.cn: 把刀叉摆放在桌子上。

phrases.cn: 铲车，叉车；叉式装卸车；万能装卸车

sentences.en: a knife and fork
sentences.cn: 一副刀叉

sentences.en: Some young people are carrying knives to defend themselves.
sentences.cn: 一些年轻人带着刀子防身。

sentences.en: a kitchen knife
sentences.cn: 厨房用刀

phrases.cn: 低级小饭馆；经济小吃店
财富（尤指继承的遗产）；电影（集合名词）；电影业

sentences.en: What time do you usually have dinner?
sentences.cn: 你通常什么时候吃饭？

sentences.en: We’re having fish for dinner tonight.
sentences.cn: 我们今天晚饭吃鱼。

sentences.en: What’s for dinner?
sentences.cn: 晚饭吃什么？

sentences.en: Come on. Aren’t you ready yet?
sentences.cn: 快点，你还没准备好吗？

sentences.en: When the doorbell rang he was ready and waiting .
sentences.cn: 门铃响的时候，他已经准备好在等着了。

sentences.en: Why does it take you so long to get ready to go out?
sentences.cn: 你外出怎么要准备那么长时间？

sentences.en: Pass the salt, please.
sentences.cn: 请把盐递过来。

sentences.en: I passed the note back to her.
sentences.cn: 我把纸条递还给她。

sentences.en: Let’s have a rest and then we’ll try again.
sentences.cn: 我们休息一下，然后再试。

sentences.en: I tried everything to lose weight with no success.
sentences.cn: 我试了各种方法减肥，但都没有成功。

sentences.en: I tried and tried (= kept making an effort ) and eventually I was offered a job.
sentences.cn: 我一次次地尝试，终于有人给了我一份工作。

phrases.cn: [口语]争取(做某事)，竭力，尽力(做某事)[此短语不用于由tried或trying构成的各种动词形式]

sentences.en: Children need their parents.
sentences.cn: 孩子们需要父母。

sentences.en: This is where a lot of parents go wrong.
sentences.cn: 正是在这一点上许多父母都错了。

sentences.en: Lily spent years caring for her sick uncle.
sentences.cn: 莉莉照顾了她生病的叔叔好多年。

sentences.en: After his parents cashed in, he lived with his uncle.
sentences.cn: 他在父母去世后，与叔叔在一起过。

sentences.en: When she was orphaned,her uncle sent her to orphanage.
sentences.cn: 她的父母刚一去世，她的叔叔便把她送进了孤儿院。

phrases.cn: [口]山姆大叔（美国政府的绰号）
汤姆叔叔；逆来顺受的美国黑人

sentences.en: Aunt Mary
sentences.cn: 玛丽姑妈

phrases.cn: （英）问答专栏阿姨；心理咨询阿姨

sentences.en: You've got a baby brother and a baby sister.
sentences.cn: 你有一个小弟弟和一个小妹妹。

sentences.en: Father: But your mother has had twins. You've got a baby brother and a baby sister.
sentences.cn: 父亲：但是你妈妈生了双胞胎，你有一个小弟弟和一个小妹妹。

sentences.en: Now Benjamin was the baby brother, so he didn't know much about this. But those 10 older brothers saw that new coat Joseph had, and they were very upset.
sentences.cn: 在那个时候，他的小弟弟本洁明还不太懂事，但是那十个哥哥看到约瑟的彩衣，他们非常非常生气，他们看见父亲喜欢约瑟，他们就更恨约瑟。

sentences.en: She was treated by her local doctor.
sentences.cn: 她由她的本区医生治疗。

sentences.en: I’d like to make an appointment to see Dr Pugh.
sentences.cn: 我想预约看皮尤医生。

sentences.en: They had a butler, a cook, and a maid.
sentences.cn: 他们有一位管家、一位厨师和一位女仆。

sentences.en: a taxi driver
sentences.cn: 出租车司机

sentences.en: Do you think you’re a good driver?
sentences.cn: 你认为自己是个好司机吗？

sentences.en: I have subleased a plot from the farmer.
sentences.cn: 我从农民那里租下了一小块地。

sentences.en: The farmer peddled his fruit from house to house.
sentences.cn: 那个农民挨家挨户兜售他的水果。

sentences.en: As a farmer, you should learn how to yoke the oxen together.
sentences.cn: 作为农民，你应该学会怎样把一对牛用轭连起来。

sentences.en: The nurse is coming to give you an injection.
sentences.cn: 护士会来给你打针。

sentences.en: The school nurse sent Sara home.
sentences.cn: 学校的护士送萨拉回家。

sentences.en: a male nurse
sentences.cn: 男护士

sentences.en: How many people were at the meeting?
sentences.cn: 有多少人到会？

sentences.en: At least 40 people were killed.
sentences.cn: 至少有40人遇害。

sentences.en: the people who live next door
sentences.cn: 住在隔壁的那些人

sentences.en: It’s an old car, but it’s very reliable.
sentences.cn: 这是一辆旧车，但是性能非常可靠。

sentences.en: They rushed to the hospital, but they were too late.
sentences.cn: 他们急忙赶到医院，但是已经太迟了。

sentences.en: We’ve invited the boss, but she may decide not to come.
sentences.cn: 我们邀请过老板，但她有可能决定不来。

sentences.en: a little house
sentences.cn: 小屋

sentences.en: a cake decorated with little flowers
sentences.cn: 点缀着小花的蛋糕

sentences.en: She was cutting the meat up into little bits.
sentences.cn: 她把肉切成小丁。

sentences.en: a six-month-old puppy
sentences.cn: 一只六个月大的小狗

phrases.cn: 早年初恋；少男少女间短暂的爱情（等于calf love）

sentences.en: He broke in as a football player.
sentences.cn: 他开始当一名足球运动员。

sentences.en: The football player is lacking in experience.
sentences.cn: 这个足球运动员经验不足。

sentences.en: They admired him as the city's best football player.
sentences.cn: 他们都称赞他是本市最佳足球运动员。

sentences.en: Do you enjoy your job?
sentences.cn: 你喜欢自己的工作吗？

sentences.en: It was the first paid job I ever had.
sentences.cn: 这是我第一份拿工资的工作。

sentences.en: He’s been in the job for six years.
sentences.cn: 他干这份工作有六年了。

phrases.cn: 好运；幸运的事情；干的不错

sentences.en: We love playing basketball.
sentences.cn: 我们爱打篮球。

sentences.en: His injury incapacitated him for playing basketball.
sentences.cn: 他因受伤而不能打篮球了。

sentences.en: They ransacked the whole classroom for their basketball.
sentences.cn: 他们翻遍了整个教室寻找他们的篮球。

phrases.cn: n. 篮球选手；篮球球员
